resources.string: FlexiTasks are tasks without a fixed date. They still have a rough time frame they need to be completed in, but this time frame is flexible. They are ranked and given a priority color based on how due/overdue they are relative to their time frame. For instance a weekly task that is 1 day overdue is considered more overdue than a yearly task that is 1 week overdue.
FixedTasks are tasks with fixed due dates, meaning they need to be completed at a specified time and date
The settings page lets you set a time for daily notification and change the apps color preferences to support a color deficiency
The history tab lets you view previously completed tasks. You can filter by task type and completion date.
